planets.description: Achievements focused on strength, endurance, mobility, and real-world physical challenges.

achievements.title: Morning Stretch
achievements.description: Do a 10-minute full-body stretching routine every morning for 7 consecutive days.

achievements.title: 10k Steps
achievements.description: Walk at least 10,000 steps in a single day.

achievements.title: Push-Up Starter
achievements.description: Complete 20 push-ups in one set.

achievements.title: Plank Basics
achievements.description: Hold a plank position for 60 seconds.

achievements.title: Beginner Run
achievements.description: Run or jog 2.5 km without stopping.

achievements.title: Daily Hydration
achievements.description: Drink at least 2 liters of water in a day for 7 days.

achievements.title: Bodyweight Squats
achievements.description: Complete 50 bodyweight squats in one session.

achievements.title: Stair Climber
achievements.description: Climb the equivalent of 10 flights of stairs in a day.

achievements.title: Balance Test
achievements.description: Hold single-leg balance for 30 seconds each leg.

achievements.title: Bike Ride
achievements.description: Cycle 10 km in one ride.

achievements.title: Wall Sit
achievements.description: Hold a wall-sit for 90 seconds.

achievements.title: Mobility Flow
achievements.description: Complete a 15-minute mobility session focused on joints.

achievements.title: Beginner Swim
achievements.description: Swim continuously for 10 minutes.

achievements.title: Healthy Meal
achievements.description: Prepare and eat a balanced protein-rich meal.

achievements.title: Sleep Routine
achievements.description: Go to bed and wake up within a consistent 8-hour window for 5 nights.

achievements.title: Light Hike
achievements.description: Complete a 5 km easy hike outdoors.

achievements.title: Jump Rope
achievements.description: Do 200 jump rope skips in one session.

achievements.title: Core Routine
achievements.description: Complete a 10-minute core workout.

achievements.title: Posture Check
achievements.description: Do a daily posture routine for 7 days.

achievements.title: Active Rest Day
achievements.description: Take a fully active rest day with light movement and stretching.

achievements.title: 5k Run
achievements.description: Run 5 km at a steady pace without walking.

achievements.title: 50 Push-Ups
achievements.description: Accumulate 50 push-ups across sets in one workout.

achievements.title: 2-Min Plank
achievements.description: Hold a plank position for 2 minutes.

achievements.title: 100 Squats
achievements.description: Complete 100 bodyweight squats in a session.

achievements.title: 25k Cycle
achievements.description: Cycle 25 km in one ride.

achievements.title: Interval Run
achievements.description: Complete a HIIT running session (e.g., 8x30s sprints with recovery).

achievements.title: Pull-Up Intro
achievements.description: Perform 3 strict pull-ups or assisted pull-ups.

achievements.title: Stair Challenge
achievements.description: Climb 30 flights of stairs in a day.

achievements.title: Swimming Laps
achievements.description: Complete 20 continuous swimming laps.

achievements.title: Weighted Carry
achievements.description: Carry a heavy bag for 1 km without stopping.

achievements.title: Flexibility Test
achievements.description: Touch your toes and hold for 30 seconds, daily for 5 days.

achievements.title: Tempo Ride
achievements.description: Complete a steady 40-minute cycle at moderate effort.

achievements.title: Trail Hike
achievements.description: Complete a 12 km hike with elevation gain.

achievements.title: Box Jump Intro
achievements.description: Perform 20 controlled box jumps with safe form.

achievements.title: Beginner Deadlift
achievements.description: Learn and perform a safe deadlift with light weight (coach or video guided).

achievements.title: Core Strength
achievements.description: Complete a 20-minute core strength routine.

achievements.title: 30-Min Cardio
achievements.description: Sustain continuous moderate cardio for 30 minutes.

achievements.title: Agility Drills
achievements.description: Complete a 15-minute agility ladder or cone drill session.

achievements.title: Farmer's Walk
achievements.description: Perform 4 sets of 40m farmer's walks.

achievements.title: Recovery Routine
achievements.description: Follow a structured recovery routine (foam rolling + stretch) post-workout for 7 days.

tiers.description: Advanced physical challenges requiring serious effort.

achievements.title: 10k Race
achievements.description: Complete a timed 10 km run.

achievements.title: 100 Push-Ups
achievements.description: Accumulate 100 push-ups in a single workout.

achievements.title: 3-Min Plank
achievements.description: Hold a plank for 3 minutes.

achievements.title: Pistol Squat Intro
achievements.description: Perform assisted pistol squats with control.

achievements.title: 50k Cycle
achievements.description: Cycle 50 km in one ride.

achievements.title: Hill Repeats
achievements.description: Complete a hill repeat session (6+ repeats) with effort.

achievements.title: 5 Pull-Ups
achievements.description: Perform 5 strict pull-ups unassisted.

achievements.title: Weighted Squat
achievements.description: Perform 5 sets of barbell squats at moderate weight (or loaded alternative).

achievements.title: Open Water Swim
achievements.description: Swim in open water for 20 minutes safely.

achievements.title: L-Sit Progression
achievements.description: Progress towards a 10-second L-sit hold through consistent practice.

achievements.title: Sprint Training
achievements.description: Complete a structured sprint training session (track or field).

achievements.title: Boxing Session
achievements.description: Complete a 45-minute boxing or striking conditioning class.

achievements.title: Kettlebell Work
achievements.description: Perform a 20-minute kettlebell routine (swings, cleans).

achievements.title: Endurance Hike
achievements.description: Hike 20 km with sustained pace.

achievements.title: Deadlift PR
achievements.description: Set a new personal best deadlift for your experience level.

achievements.title: Mobility Mastery
achievements.description: Follow an advanced mobility plan for 14 days.

achievements.title: Core Endurance
achievements.description: Complete a 30-minute core endurance session.

achievements.title: CrossTraining
achievements.description: Complete a cross-training session mixing cardio and strength for 60 minutes.

achievements.title: Plyometric Session
achievements.description: Perform a 30-minute plyometrics workout focused on power.

achievements.title: Nutrition Streak
achievements.description: Log and maintain a protein-focused diet for 14 days.

tiers.description: Expert-level physical feats that require discipline.

achievements.title: Half Marathon
achievements.description: Complete a half marathon (21.1 km).

achievements.title: 200 Push-Ups
achievements.description: Accumulate 200 push-ups in a single workout.

achievements.title: 4-Min Plank
achievements.description: Hold a plank for 4 minutes.

achievements.title: Unassisted Pistol
achievements.description: Perform 5 unassisted pistol squats each leg.

achievements.title: 100k Cycle
achievements.description: Cycle 100 km in one ride.

achievements.title: Mountain Climb
achievements.description: Complete a multi-day mountain route or an intense single-day ascent.

achievements.title: 10 Pull-Ups
achievements.description: Perform 10 strict pull-ups in one set.

achievements.title: Heavy Squat
achievements.description: Complete heavy barbell squats (challenging weight for you).

achievements.title: Open Water Challenge
achievements.description: Swim 1 km in open water.

achievements.title: Advanced L-Sit
achievements.description: Hold an L-sit for 20 seconds.

achievements.title: Sprint Race
achievements.description: Compete in a local sprint or timed event.

achievements.title: Competitive Fight
achievements.description: Complete an amateur sparring or competitive match (safely).

achievements.title: Strongman Event
achievements.description: Participate in a local strongman or lifting challenge.

achievements.title: Multi-Day Hike
achievements.description: Complete a 2-day hike with loaded backpack.

achievements.title: Deadlift Elite
achievements.description: Hit a deadlift PR that aligns with elite-level benchmarks.

achievements.title: Advanced Mobility Cycle
achievements.description: Complete a mobility and recovery cycle for 30 days.

achievements.title: Endurance Brick
achievements.description: Complete a triathlon brick workout (bike + run) session.

achievements.title: 100-Min Workout
achievements.description: Sustain focused training for 100 continuous minutes.

achievements.title: Plyo Power
achievements.description: Reach new vertical leap height after targeted training.

achievements.title: Competition Prep
achievements.description: Follow a 12-week competition prep plan and complete it.

tiers.description: Legendary physical achievements reserved for the elite few.

achievements.title: Marathon
achievements.description: Complete a full marathon (42.195 km).

achievements.title: 500 Push-Ups
achievements.description: Accumulate 500 push-ups spread across a single event/workout.

achievements.title: 5-Min Plank
achievements.description: Hold a plank for 5 minutes.

achievements.title: Full Pistol Routine
achievements.description: Perform 20 unassisted pistol squats total with excellent form.

achievements.title: 200k Cycle
achievements.description: Cycle 200 km in a single ride.

achievements.title: Summit Peak
achievements.description: Summit a major mountain peak (plan, train, and accomplish).

achievements.title: 20 Pull-Ups
achievements.description: Perform 20 strict pull-ups in one set.

achievements.title: Ultra Marathon
achievements.description: Complete an ultra marathon.

achievements.title: Ironman Triathlon
achievements.description: Complete an Ironman triathlon.

achievements.title: Advanced Gymnastics
achievements.description: Master advanced gymnastics moves.

achievements.title: Extreme Sports
achievements.description: Participate in extreme sports event.

achievements.title: World Record Attempt
achievements.description: Attempt a world record in a physical feat.

achievements.title: Master Trainer
achievements.description: Train others to achieve elite levels.

achievements.title: Lifetime Fitness
achievements.description: Maintain peak fitness for a year.

achievements.title: Adventure Race
achievements.description: Complete a multi-day adventure race.

achievements.title: Yoga Master
achievements.description: Achieve yoga master level.

achievements.title: Martial Arts Black Belt
achievements.description: Earn a black belt in martial arts.

achievements.title: Olympic Training
achievements.description: Train like an Olympic athlete.

achievements.title: Survival Challenge
achievements.description: Complete a survival challenge.

achievements.title: Physical Hall
achievements.description: Complete all physical achievements.

planets.description: Achievements focused on travel, discovery, adventure, and cultural experiences.

achievements.title: Local Park Visit
achievements.description: Visit a local park and spend an hour exploring.

achievements.title: City Walk
achievements.description: Walk around your city for 5 km.

achievements.title: Museum Visit
achievements.description: Visit a local museum.

achievements.title: Nature Trail
achievements.description: Walk a nature trail.

achievements.title: New Restaurant
achievements.description: Try a new restaurant in town.

achievements.title: Public Transport
achievements.description: Use public transport to a new place.

achievements.title: Local Event
achievements.description: Attend a local event.

achievements.title: Bike Exploration
achievements.description: Explore by bike for 10 km.

achievements.title: Photo Diary
achievements.description: Take photos of 5 new places.

achievements.title: Map Reading
achievements.description: Use a map to navigate to a spot.

achievements.title: Neighbor Town
achievements.description: Visit a neighboring town.

achievements.title: Street Art Hunt
achievements.description: Find street art in your city.

achievements.title: Beach Day
achievements.description: Spend a day at the beach exploring.

achievements.title: Forest Walk
achievements.description: Walk in a forest.

achievements.title: Historical Site
achievements.description: Visit a historical site nearby.

achievements.title: Market Exploration
achievements.description: Explore a local market.

achievements.title: Local History
achievements.description: Read about your town's history and visit a related spot.

achievements.title: Hidden Gem
achievements.description: Find and document a 'hidden gem' location nearby.

achievements.title: Map Challenge
achievements.description: Create a short guide of 5 places to visit in one afternoon.

achievements.title: Weekend Microtrip
achievements.description: Plan a small weekend microtrip nearby.

tiers.description: Moderate trips and experiments requiring planning.

achievements.title: Regional Trip
achievements.description: Plan and take a regional day-trip with varied stops.

achievements.title: Try Adventure Sport
achievements.description: Try an adventure sport (climbing, kayaking, etc.) once.

achievements.title: Local Host
achievements.description: Host an exchange visitor or guest for a short stay.

achievements.title: Cultural Immersion
achievements.description: Spend a full day immersed in a cultural neighborhood.

achievements.title: Food Tour
achievements.description: Do a food tour sampling 5 distinct local dishes.

achievements.title: Backpacking Intro
achievements.description: Plan and complete an overnight backpacking trip.

achievements.title: Photography Project
achievements.description: Complete a themed photography project over a weekend.

achievements.title: Historic Route
achievements.description: Travel a historic trail or route locally.

achievements.title: Language Tryout
achievements.description: Use basic phrases while traveling to practice a language.

achievements.title: Travel Budget
achievements.description: Plan a budget for a short trip and stick to it.

achievements.title: Camp Night
achievements.description: Spend a night camping outdoors.

achievements.title: Train Journey
achievements.description: Take a scenic train trip and document the route.

achievements.title: Island Visit
achievements.description: Visit a nearby island or coastal spot.

achievements.title: Local Guide
achievements.description: Become a local guide for a friend visiting your area.

achievements.title: Outdoor Challenge
achievements.description: Complete a day outdoors with varied terrain.

achievements.title: Try Farming
achievements.description: Visit a farm or help on a small agricultural task.

achievements.title: Urban Hike
achievements.description: Do a long urban hike connecting city landmarks.

achievements.title: Travel Book
achievements.description: Read a travel memoir and plan a route inspired by it.

achievements.title: Rural Exploration
achievements.description: Visit rural areas and document a local story.

achievements.title: Civic Exploration
achievements.description: Interview a local about their neighborhood's history.

achievements.title: National Trip
achievements.description: Plan and complete a multi-day trip within your country.

achievements.title: Solo Overnight
achievements.description: Take a solo overnight trip and manage logistics independently.

achievements.title: Extended Hike
achievements.description: Complete a challenging one-day hike of 20+ km.

achievements.title: Cultural Exchange
achievements.description: Host or join a cultural exchange program for several days.

achievements.title: Island Hopping
achievements.description: Plan a short island-hopping trip.

achievements.title: Language Immersion Week
achievements.description: Spend a week practicing a language intensively while traveling.

achievements.title: Road Trip Plan
achievements.description: Plan and execute a 3-5 day road trip with multiple stops.

achievements.title: Volunteer Trip
achievements.description: Join a short volunteer project away from home.

achievements.title: Historic Immersion
achievements.description: Spend days exploring a historical region with deep study.

achievements.title: Wild Camping
achievements.description: Complete a wild camping experience with minimal facilities.

achievements.title: Adventure Trail
achievements.description: Tackle a multi-stage adventure trail or route.

achievements.title: Culinary Tour
achievements.description: Plan a culinary-focused trip exploring regional foods.

achievements.title: Photography Expedition
achievements.description: Lead a photo expedition for a weekend.

achievements.title: Cultural Project
achievements.description: Create a small cultural documentation project while traveling.

achievements.title: Maritime Trip
achievements.description: Take a multi-day sailing or boating trip.

achievements.title: Nature Research
achievements.description: Conduct a small nature observation project over multiple days.

achievements.title: Trail Leadership
achievements.description: Lead a group on a multi-day hike or trail.

achievements.title: Remote Stay
achievements.description: Spend time in a remote location to test self-sufficiency.

achievements.title: Long Ride
achievements.description: Cycle for several days on a planned route.

achievements.title: Exploration Journal
achievements.description: Keep a detailed exploration journal for a week-long trip.

tiers.description: Ambitious exploration feats and cultural immersion.

achievements.title: International Trip
achievements.description: Plan and take an international trip with cultural objectives.

achievements.title: Multi-Week Adventure
achievements.description: Complete a multi-week exploration or travel experience.

achievements.title: Research Expedition
achievements.description: Join or lead a small research expedition.

achievements.title: Cross-Country Route
achievements.description: Traverse a major cross-country route by transport or foot.

achievements.title: Cultural Residency
achievements.description: Participate in a cultural residency abroad.

achievements.title: Sustainable Travel Project
achievements.description: Complete a travel project focused on sustainability.

achievements.title: Exploration Documentary
achievements.description: Produce a short documentary about a region you visit.

achievements.title: Remote Expedition
achievements.description: Plan and complete a remote terrain expedition with prep.

achievements.title: Language Mastery Trip
achievements.description: Use a language reliably during a month-long trip.

achievements.title: Cross-Border Collaboration
achievements.description: Coordinate an exploration project spanning borders.

achievements.title: Expedition Leadership
achievements.description: Lead a team on a complex multi-day expedition.

achievements.title: Cultural Exchange Program
achievements.description: Set up a cultural exchange with planning and outcomes.

achievements.title: Marathon Trek
achievements.description: Complete a long-distance trek over several days.

achievements.title: Conservation Project
achievements.description: Participate in a conservation or restoration project on-site.

achievements.title: Island Expedition
achievements.description: Plan and execute a multi-day island exploration.

achievements.title: Documentary Feature
achievements.description: Feature your exploration work in a public documentary.

achievements.title: Historic Route Completion
achievements.description: Complete a historic route end-to-end.

achievements.title: Explorer Fellowship
achievements.description: Obtain or apply for an exploration fellowship or grant.

achievements.title: Cross-Discipline Expedition
achievements.description: Lead an expedition combining science and culture.

achievements.title: Exploration Hall
achievements.description: Complete every achievement on the Exploration planet.

tiers.description: Grand expeditions, creations, or lifelong discovery projects.

achievements.title: Round-The-World Plan
achievements.description: Design and undertake a multi-month global exploration plan.

achievements.title: Major Expedition
achievements.description: Lead or participate in a major expedition with logistical complexity.

achievements.title: Cultural Impact Project
achievements.description: Create a project that benefits a host community materially.

achievements.title: Scientific Contribution
achievements.description: Contribute data or findings to a scientific study from fieldwork.

achievements.title: Legacy Route
achievements.description: Document and complete a long-term route that others follow.

achievements.title: World Tour
achievements.description: Complete a tour that visits multiple continents with a cohesive plan.

achievements.title: Exploration Book
achievements.description: Author a book detailing a major exploration or expedition.

achievements.title: International Fellowship
achievements.description: Secure an international fellowship for exploration.

achievements.title: Conservation Leadership
achievements.description: Lead a conservation initiative with measurable outcomes.

achievements.title: Heritage Preservation
achievements.description: Help preserve a cultural heritage site or practice.

achievements.title: Cross-Cultural Program
achievements.description: Create a cross-cultural exchange program with sustainable outcomes.

achievements.title: Large-Scale Documentary
achievements.description: Produce a full-length documentary based on extensive travel.

achievements.title: Expedition Legacy
achievements.description: Create a lasting expedition program used by others.

achievements.title: Global Research Network
achievements.description: Help establish a network for global field research.

achievements.title: Grand Exploration
achievements.description: Complete a personally defined grand exploration of significance.

achievements.title: Explorer Award
achievements.description: Receive recognition or award for major exploration work.

achievements.title: Legacy Expedition
achievements.description: Organize an expedition that becomes a model for others.

achievements.title: Cross-Continental Route
achievements.description: Traverse multiple continents on a planned route.

achievements.title: Exploration Foundation
achievements.description: Start an organization supporting exploration projects.

achievements.title: Hall of Exploration
achievements.description: Finish every achievement on the Exploration planet.
